mutants.code:
import re
from collections import defaultdict

def find_longest_word(string):
    word_count = defaultdict(int)
    longest_word = 'MUTATED'
    words = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', string, re.UNICODE)
    for word in words:
        word_count[word] += 1
        if len(word) > len(longest_word):
            longest_word = word
    return longest_word

import re
from collections import defaultdict

def find_longest_word(string):
    word_count = defaultdict(int)
    longest_word = ''
    words = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', string, re.UNICODE)
    for word in words:
        word_count[word] -= 1
        if len(word) > len(longest_word):
            longest_word = word
    return longest_word

mutants.original_line: words = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', string, re.UNICODE)  # find all words in the string

import re
from collections import defaultdict

def find_longest_word(string):
    word_count = defaultdict(int)
    longest_word = ''
    words = re.findall('', string, re.UNICODE)
    for word in words:
        word_count[word] += 1
        if len(word) > len(longest_word):
            longest_word = word
    return longest_word

    word_count = defaultdict(int)
    longest_word = ''

    for word in words:
        word_count[word] += 2
        if len(word) > len(longest_word):
            longest_word = word
    return longest_word

import re
from collections import defaultdict

def find_longest_word(string):
    word_count = defaultdict(int)
    longest_word = ''
    words = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', string, re.UNICODE)
    for word in words:
        word_count[word] += 1
        if len(word) <= len(longest_word):
            longest_word = word
    return longest_word

import re
from collections import defaultdict

def find_longest_word(string):
    word_count = defaultdict(int)
    longest_word = ''
    words = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', string, re.UNICODE)
    for word in words:
        word_count[word] += 1
        if len(word) != len(longest_word):
            longest_word = word
    return longest_word
